acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable Pojos with non generic collections
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojosWithNonGenericCollections

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithNonGenericCollectionsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@132e0e20 elements
Then the Set<?> <span class='step-parameter'>[java.lang.Object@26c6e9d6 should contain at least one non-empty element
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@3e79c9e0 elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{java.lang.Object@1ba311d0=java.lang.Object@b8b6de6 should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly java.lang.Object@2fa69580=java.lang.Object@5341eab4 elements
